summary: Rust code in the core-bridge package should be formatted and linted using cargo fmt and cargo clippy as part of the npm run format and lint scripts to ensure these tools are regularly applied.
userImpact: Developers working on core-bridge code will have better code quality assurance without needing to remember to run cargo fmt and clippy separately.
proposedFix: Integrate cargo fmt and cargo clippy execution into the npm package's format and lint scripts.
resolutionDetails: The feature was implemented to run cargo fmt and clippy from npm scripts.
keyQuote: Running these commands from that NPM package's `format` and `lint` scripts would help ensure that they are regularly run.
